name: Kung Food (itch)
description:
Kung Food is a refreshing take on a cooking game. In this game you must ruthlessly defeat you opponent in combat to cook them into a meal. 


The Game Currently has
-2 Characters
-2 maps
-local PVP
-Controller suport
-Parring & Blocking
-Customizable Controls

Kung Food will strive to make the game more enjoyable and in depth as we go.

Goals
-9 Total characters All with Unique Combos and Specials Moves
-9 Maps. One fore each character
- Online PvP
-A Challenge System

Kung Food is creating a roster of Unique and interesting characters all 3d Modeled.
